timeline.bodyText: We should update the version of gRPC we are vendoring instead of changing the versions we are using here.
timeline.author: lukecwik
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -27,7 +27,7 @@ class GrpcVendoring_1_26_0 {
   static def protobuf_version = "3.11.0"
   static def grpc_version = "1.26.0"
   static def gson_version = "2.8.6"
-  static def netty_version = "4.1.42.Final"
+  static def netty_version = "4.1.50.Final"

replies.bodyText:
Here is an example of an update: #10578 (the process was different back then but breaks down to):

Create a new GrpcVendoring_1_31_0.groovy file with the updated deps
Release the vendored artifact (https://s.apache.org/beam-release-vendored-artifacts)
Consume the newly released artifact by updating all the java import paths etc..

It would be best to separate the gRPC update process from this PR.
replies.author: lukecwik

timeline.bodyText: why did this need to change?
timeline.author: lukecwik
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -581,7 +581,7 @@ class BeamModulePlugin implements Plugin<Project> {
         maven_exec_plugin    : "maven-plugins:maven-exec-plugin:1.6.0",
         maven_jar_plugin     : "maven-plugins:maven-jar-plugin:3.0.2",
         maven_shade_plugin   : "maven-plugins:maven-shade-plugin:3.1.0",
-        maven_surefire_plugin: "maven-plugins:maven-surefire-plugin:2.21.0",
+        maven_surefire_plugin: "maven-plugins:maven-surefire-plugin:3.0.0-M5",

replies.bodyText: Upgraded surefire-plugin to 3.0.0-M5 due to compatibility.
replies.author: odidev

timeline.message:
Upgrade netty and netty_tcnative to latest version

- Updated netty to "4.1.51.Final" and netty_tcnative to "2.0.33.Final"
- Upgraded surefire to 3.0.0-M5 due to compatibility

timeline.bodyText:
This is a blog post about Beam 2.11 so I think we want to keep the old version numbers around.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            * Java: netty_handler: 4.1.51.Final
          
          
            
            * Java: netty_tcnative_boringssl_static: 2.0.33.Final
          
          
            
            * Java: netty_transport_native_epoll: 4.1.51.Final
          
          
            
            * Java: netty_handler: 4.1.30.Final
          
          
            
            * Java: netty_tcnative_boringssl_static: 2.0.17.Final
          
          
            
            * Java: netty_transport_native_epoll: 4.1.30.Final
timeline.author: lukecwik
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -58,9 +58,9 @@ For more information on changes in 2.11.0, check out the
 * Java: grpc_protobuf_lite: 1.17.1
 * Java: grpc_netty: 1.17.1
 * Java: grpc_stub: 1.17.1
-* Java: netty_handler: 4.1.30.Final
-* Java: netty_tcnative_boringssl_static: 2.0.17.Final
-* Java: netty_transport_native_epoll: 4.1.30.Final
+* Java: netty_handler: 4.1.51.Final
+* Java: netty_tcnative_boringssl_static: 2.0.33.Final
+* Java: netty_transport_native_epoll: 4.1.51.Final
